name: Belladonna
notes: Useful in sudden onset fever with flushed face and throbbing pain.
precautions: Not for prolonged use without practitioner advice

name: Arsenicum Album
dosage: 1 pill every 2-3 hours for acute stage
notes: Great for food poisoning with burning stools and restlessness.
precautions: Seek medical care for severe dehydration

name: Rhus Toxicodendron
notes: Best for stiffness that improves with continued motion.
